pages.text: $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Enchantments)Enchanting Pedestal Upgrades/$ This is a general Overview of the enchants available, more detailed info will be included in the individual upgrades documentation

Pedestal Upgrades can be Enchanted with up to 7 Different Enchantments$(li)Pedestal Capacity$(li)Pedestal Range$(li)Pedestal Speed$(li)Pedestal Area$(li)Pedestal Advanced$(li)Silktouch (Vanilla)$(li)Fortune (Vanilla)

$(li)The first 4 Can be enchanted directly onto the upgrades using an enchanting table, the enchanting upgrade, or with books in the anvil/ anvil upgrade.$(li)Another option available if you dont want the randomness of an enchanting table, is by using Enchantment Focused Books.$(li)The last 3 enchantments HAVE to be applied using the Exp Anvil Upgrade.

pages.title: Pedestal Capacity
pages.text: (Light Grey or Aqua Tooltip Text)$(li)Generally this will increase the amount of items being handled by an upgrade, with XP upgrades it will increase the amount of xp the upgrade can handle and store.$(li)Tooltip Examples:$(li2)Dropped Stack Size$(li2)Transfer Rate$(li2)Items Smelted/Crushed/Sawn Per Operation$(li2)Recipes Crafted Per Operation

Typical Increase Interval By Enchantment Level$(li)0 : 1 Item$(li)1 : 4 Items$(li)2 : 8 Items$(li)3 : 16 Items$(li)4 : 32 items$(li)5 : 64 Items$(br)There are some exceptions to this norm, like the Crafting Upgrade, which maxes out at 16 'crafts' at one time, or the XP Upgrades which max XP capacity can range from 10 levels to 1000000 levels of storage.

pages.title: Pedestal Range
pages.text: (White Tooltip Text)$(li)This Enchant increases the range or area of effect of upgrades$(li)Tooltip Examples Include:$(li2)Dropper/Breaker/Placer Range$(li2)Teleporter Range$(li)Range usually is a height/depth distance(Above or below the pedestal respective to its placement).
Typical Range Increase By Enchantment Level:$(li)0 : 1 Block$(li)1 : 2 Blocks$(li)2 : 4 Blocks$(li)3 : 8 Blocks$(li)4 : 12 Blocks$(li)5 : 16 Blocks$(br)(The Quarry Upgrade(s) scales from 8-64 blocks)

pages.title: Pedestal Area
pages.text: $(li)This Enchant Controls The Effected Area or AOE of specific upgrades.$(li)The Soft Cap to an upgrades 'AOE' is enchant level 5, but this can be 'OverCombined' in the Exp Anvil Upgrade to get increased 'AOE' beyond the Soft Cap.

Typical AOE Increase By Enchantment Level (X,Y,Z - also Y heights are typically influenced by Range instead):$(li)0 : 3x(Y)x3$(li)1 : 5x(Y)x5$(li)2 : 7x(Y)x7$(li)3 : 9x(Y)x9$(li)4 : 11x(Y)x11$(li)5 : 13x(Y)x13

pages.title: Pedestal Advanced
pages.text: This Enchant Allows for Upgrades that use an 'inventory below' them to be able to the inventory of any entity as well.$(li)There is only 1 Level of this Enchantment$(li2)This Enchantment can only be gotten by enchanting the Focused Enchantable Books (Advanced) at level 92 or above, the Exp Enchanter can be used for this.

pages.title: Vanilla Enchants
pages.text: Fortune and Silktouch HAVE to be added using the Anvil Upgrade.$(li)Fortune can be applied to any upgrade that breaks blocks.$(li)Silk touch can also be applied to any upgrade that breaks blocks, as well as the cobble stone generator upgrade.
